Greenbelt new Carrollton Lanham these are the cities where members were living the world was called Kelton ward we went to a home and the gentleman from Austria play a record none of us knew what it was but he would play it and listen now that I've reached his age as I have similar feelings there are certain songs that capture and become a packet of memory this memory can be from a resident rest resident from my parents generation or from my younger days or teenage to 20s many other songs of melancholy nature the few that are hopeful teacher I have gain appreciation for the way music conveys and captures our feelings and words
